paragraph.heading: 1Name field
paragraph.paragraph:
The feature name field is a textbox that lets you enter a name for the feature. For help on how to choose the right name for a feature, see:
http://www.eiffel.com/doc/oosc/ Object-Oriented Software Construction, Second Edition , paragraph 26.2.
paragraph.warning: Warning: EiffelStudio performs no validation on the name you choose. For example if you type a space in it, it will generate the code, and detect a syntax error only when compiling.
